data.title: great fishing
data.text: on vacation  from chicago with family, my teenage boys wanted to go fishing called 2 other captains no luck but second one told me try captain tom and glad i did.  great guy asked if we wanted to troll or bottom fish,boys said whatever gives us best chance to catch fish.  he put out bags with little pieces of fish to attract bigger fish and for 3 1/2 hrs we caught yellowtail snapper,mutton snapper and at least 6 other types of fish including 2 kingfish.  i called on a tuesday afternoon and wednesday morning we were fishing        thank you captain tom for a great trip   the glass family
